rihanna

Eminem/Rihanna Tour shows Enormous Demand

Author: Nufios Staff

Eminem and Rihanna are launching a new, "Monster Tour" set to start in early August.

The tour will start on August 7th in LA. Other dates scheduled are August 16th for New York City, and August 22nd for Detroit, Eminem's home city.

So far there has been a great deal of demand for this show, due to the fact that there will only be three tour locations.

Detroit was likely chosen as a location because of Eminem's great affinity and love for his hometown.
